attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having arrived back in the UK 2 years ago (Retired Military) I decided to purchase a family pet.  My pet, over the fireworks period, becomes distressed.  I decided to go to the vets to ask for a treatment on two occassions over the two years.  In comparison to the previouse year, I paid 400% more for these basic drugs.  The basic drugs are actually for humans.

I paid: 

First year   - £4.50
Second Year  - £42.50

This is extortion.... We must regulate this process now; we all have pets and eventually it will hit us all.....!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
